column1:
share on x jun 14 at 3:34 pm simply elegant spathiphyllum was purchased for the family of violet e. charles. share on x jun 14 at 3:29 pm beautiful in blue was purchased for the family of violet e. charles. share on x dh danny & frances hager. jun 13 at 11:42 pm danny & i extend our heartfelt sympathies, love & prayers to all of mrs charles' families. we were deeply saddened to learn of her passing today but we know she's in a far better place. may you take comfort in knowing she is now resting in the arms of the lord and her precious memories will always be in your hearts and minds. we will surely keep you in our closest prayers. in christian love, danny & frances hager. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe handley funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
